  • Constructor Details

    • BigBot

      public BigBot(Players owner, String nome, Map gamemap, int current, int endLocation, int start)
      Constructor for BigBot, the parent class for all other bots.
      Parameters:
      owner - player whose this bot beliongs to
      nome - bot name
      gamemap - map the bot is gonna be moving in
      current - current index for bot
      endLocation - end location, meaning enemy flag vertex location
      start - start location, meaning ally flag location, meaning spawn point
